page.title: 16LIFE STYLES.
page.content: Then I watch T.V. for a while.Later I have my supper and go to bed at 11.00 p.m.I do my homework in the morning. My name is Julie Doyle.I have been doing a survey on people who go out of Ilfracombe to do their shopping.Most of the people in Ilfracombe do their shopping in Barnstaple once or twice a week.Only a few of Ilfracombe's population do their shopping in Ilfracombe.People only shop locally for small amounts.However, few people go out of Ilfracombe regularly for their social life.In the winter many join local pub teams to play darts, cards and skittles.
